function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and the potential for an outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, enforce social distancing measures, and encourage contactless payment options","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, mobile ordering apps, and UV-C sanitation devices","People":"Restaurant staff, customers, and delivery personnel","Owner":"Restaurant owners, Yemeksepeti, local health authorities"},{"Description":"Financial impact on restaurants and cafes if the campaign is not successful","Impact":"Loss of revenue and potential closure of businesses","Mitigation":"Provide additional financial support, marketing assistance, and business planning guidance to participating establishments","Technologies":"Financial assistance programs, digital marketing tools, and business management software","People":"Restaurant and cafe owners","Owner":"Yemeksepeti, Union of Chambers and Commodity Exchanges of Turkey"},{"Description":"Risks of fraud or misuse of the check system","Impact":"Financial losses for Yemeksepeti and participating restaurants, as well as customer dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Implement secure check validation protocols, monitor transactions closely, and provide customer education on proper use of checks","Technologies":"Secure validation algorithms, transaction monitoring software, and customer education platforms","People":"Yemeksepeti staff, restaurant staff, and customers","Owner":"Yemeksepeti"}]}
